completionMarks.name: Hush's Face
completionMarks.unlock: Keeper now holds... (Specific unlock not provided in original data)

unlockCriteria.default: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock Eve
unlockCriteria.repentance: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and defeat ??? as Eve

challenges.name: The Tank
challenges.unlockCriteria: Have 7 or more Red Heart Containers at one time

challenges.name: Solar System
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: Suicide King
challenges.unlockCriteria: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock Lazarus

challenges.name: Cat Got Your Tongue
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: Cursed!
challenges.unlockCriteria: Have 7 or more Red Heart Containers at one time

challenges.name: Glass Cannon
challenges.unlockCriteria: Beat The Family Man (challenge #19), defeat Lokii, and unlock Judas

challenges.name: Beans!
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: The Family Man
challenges.unlockCriteria: Pick up both Key Pieces from the Angels in one run
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: XXXXXXXXL
specialConditions: Every floor is the size of an XL Womb floor, but does not combine the floors of each chapter.

challenges.name: SPEED!
challenges.unlockReward: Get out of Jail Free Card
specialConditions: Everything is sped up like the Broken Watch effect.
After the game timer reaches 16 minutes, Isaac starts taking damage every 10 seconds.

challenges.name: Blue Bomber
challenges.unlockCriteria: Destroy 10 Tinted Rocks and defeat Mom's Heart 11 times
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: PAY TO PLAY
challenges.unlockCriteria: Defeat Isaac as Cain and destroy 10 Tinted Rocks
specialConditions: Every door costs 1 cent to enter.
Isaac drops money when hit.
Isaac dies if he runs out of money.

challenges.name: Have a Heart
specialConditions: Pennies drop instead of Red Hearts.
Many items that restore Red Hearts have no effect.

unlockCriteria.rebirthAndAfterbirth: Defeat ??? or The Lamb, defeat Satan as Isaac, and unlock The Negative
unlockCriteria.afterbirthPlus: Defeat ??? or The Lamb, and defeat Satan as Isaac
unlockCriteria.repentance: Defeat Mega Satan and unlock The Negative

challenges.name: BRAINS!
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: PRIDE DAY!
specialConditions: Cannot drop or replace Rainbow Worm

challenges.name: Onan's Streak
specialConditions: Missing a shot deals damage to Judas

challenges.name: The Guardian
specialConditions: Blindfolded
Isaac's Heart will follow Punching Bag instead of Isaac

challenges.name: Backasswards

unlockCriteria.repentance: Defeat Mega Satan and unlock The Negative

specialConditions: All chapters progress in reverse order, losing 1 item and 1 Red Heart container each floor ascended

challenges.name: Aprils Fool
specialConditions: The minimap displays the floor's layout accurately but displays Isaac's position inaccurately.
Pedestal items and pickups are not what they appear to be.
Active items, pills, cards, and rune effects are randomized upon each use.
Stonies have a chance of being replaced by a Cross Stoney.
Every boss is The Bloat.
Isaac's health is not what it appears to be.
Inventory pickups numbers are accurate.

challenges.name: Pokey Mans
specialConditions: Each use of Friendly Ball causes a random monster to be spawned.
Friendly Ball instantly charges once the spawned monster is killed.

challenges.name: Ultra Hard

unlockCriteria.afterbirthPlus: Defeat ??? or The Lamb. Possession of The Polaroid / The Negative is required, barring getting to Dark Room through a Sacrifice Room.
unlockCriteria.repentance: Defeat Mega Satan and unlock The Negative

specialConditions: All enemies spawn as champions if possible.
Boss fights will be double trouble if possible.
No heart pickups drop.

challenges.name: Pong
specialConditions: Damage fixed at 100
Tear delay fixed at 150

challenges.name: Scat Man
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: Bloody Mary
challenges.unlockCriteria: Unlock Bethany, Blood Bag, and It Lives!
specialConditions: 4 soul charges

challenges.name: Baptism by Fire
challenges.unlockCriteria: Defeat Satan as Bethany, defeat Mom's Heart 11 times, and unlock Maggy's Faith
specialConditions: Blindfolded

challenges.name: Seeing Double
specialConditions: All enemies and bosses are doubled

challenges.name: Pica Run
challenges.unlockCriteria: Defeat Mom's Heart 11 times and unlock Marbles
specialConditions: All items are replaced by random trinkets
Marbles activates on every hit

challenges.name: Hot Potato
challenges.unlockCriteria: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as The Forgotten
specialConditions: The Forgotten cannot fire tears and explodes every 2.5 seconds
Explosion timer resets upon entering a room or picking up an item
Blindfolded

challenges.name: Cantripped!
challenges.unlockCriteria: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as Cain
specialConditions: All cards and pills are replaced with item cards
Enemies have a chance of dropping an item card when killed
The Bag of Crafting initially holds a maximum of 3 item cards at once
Each item card shows a preview of a random Active Item that, when used, activates the effect
All boss item drops are replaced with Starter Deck, which increases the max card limit by 1 and drops 3 item cards

challenges.name: Red Redemption
challenges.unlockCriteria: Use Red Key (etc.) to open the hidden closet in Home as Jacob and Esau
specialConditions: The starting room spawns with no rooms connected to it
Rooms spawn in clusters around the map and must be found via the Red Key
The Red Key can be used an infinite number of times, but has 20 uses before Dark Esau spawns
Each subsequent 5 uses will spawn another Dark Esau if Tainted Jacob has yet to turn into his lost form
The Red Key cannot be used to open doors to I AM ERROR rooms
Each floor generates as a Curse of the Labyrinth floor, with one shop, and two item and boss rooms, except the fourth floor, which has only one boss room
All rooms may be from any floor of the current chapter

challenges.name: DELETE THIS
specialConditions: All items are randomly generated due to TMTRAINER
The theme of each area, its obstacles per area, and music are randomized
Some obstacle sprites are randomized even within a level and sometimes the music may be missing altogether
Occasionally, even the floor texture might glitch out, replacing it with a plain color
Shop item prices range from 1 cent to 99
The challenge itself appears under the challenge list without any text, effectively rendering it invisible
